page.title: 19Religion
page.content: The majority of the people are Christian i.e.Church of England,Methodist or Catholic.However alot of other religions are thriving,because they seem to have overcome being taunted by others who think they are inferior. The Norman church,now Church of E ngland,was built in 1150 and there are still remains from the original building:the font,the altar and both of the arches.At a glance graves can be seen from 1650 and earlier.The Methodist churches are not,of course,quite so old as the religion was only formed in the mid-1700's.
